###### How it works
## Never manage physical mail again
![number 1](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63af3bafea6dbc658ece0e8d/643d8610fb71e85a68d56c86_number%20one.svg)
#### Pick an address
Sign up and get an address for your business to use with the IRS, banks, vendors, and more.
![number 2](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63af3bafea6dbc658ece0e8d/643d866d9a09974f5a6e2007_number%20two.svg)
#### We receive your mail
We receive your mail at your new address where it‚Äôs handled securely.
![number 3](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63af3bafea6dbc658ece0e8d/643d866da2cda2404738d381_number%20three.svg)
#### We digitize your mail
We digitize all mail received at your Stable address so you can view it online.
![number 4](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63af3bafea6dbc658ece0e8d/643d866d1331217c65fe27b4_number%20four.svg)
#### Manage mail online
Invite teammates to manage mail together & use automations to save time spent on mail operations. 
###### Virtual Address
## Get a permanent business address
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63af3bafea6dbc658ece0e8d/63af3bafea6dbcd6b6ce0ee0_Group%2011.svg)
Premium business address: Get a unique business address you can use everywhere ‚Äî with the IRS, state, government, banks, and more.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63af3bafea6dbc658ece0e8d/63af3bafea6dbcd6b6ce0ee0_Group%2011.svg)
Change of address guidance: We make it easy to update your business address by providing pre-filled paperwork, a personalized checklist, and hands-on support.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63af3bafea6dbc658ece0e8d/63af3bafea6dbcd6b6ce0ee0_Group%2011.svg)
Never change addresses again: Use a single business address and never worry about important mail being mishandled or getting sent elsewhere again.
[Learn more![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63af3bafea6dbc658ece0e8d/63af3bafea6dbc4da5ce0ecd_Group%209.svg)](https://useStable.com/</products/virtual-address>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63af3bafea6dbc658ece0e8d/67a686733dbc58cd390c801b_map-2025-feb.svg)
###### VIRTUAL MAILBOX
## Manage your physical mail online
Receive mail and packages at your Stable address and manage your virtual mailbox from anywhere in the world
[Scan](https://useStable.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-0>)[Forward](https://useStable.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-1>)[Store & Shred](https://useStable.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)[Deposit Checks](https://useStable.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-3>)
## Scan
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63af3bafea6dbc658ece0e8d/63af3bafea6dbcd6b6ce0ee0_Group%2011.svg)
Receive mail: We automatically digitize the envelope and extract key information like sender and recipient.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63af3bafea6dbc658ece0e8d/63af3bafea6dbcd6b6ce0ee0_Group%2011.svg)
Receive packages: We accept shipments from any carrier (USPS, FedEx, UPS, DHL) and handle it like regular mail.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63af3bafea6dbc658ece0e8d/63af3bafea6dbcd6b6ce0ee0_Group%2011.svg)
Open & scan: Request high-quality scans of internal contents of any piece of mail ‚Äì for free.
[Learn more![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63af3bafea6dbc658ece0e8d/63af3bafea6dbca90ace0ed6_Group%2023.svg)](https://useStable.com/</products/virtual-mailbox>)
![a dashboard showing stable's mail scanning interface ](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63af3bafea6dbc658ece0e8d/63e41373e0828d4d43461f64_Scan.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63af3bafea6dbc658ece0e8d/643731f33097b56e85018163_scan.png)
## Forward
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63af3bafea6dbc658ece0e8d/63af3bafea6dbcd6b6ce0ee0_Group%2011.svg)
Forward mail & packages: Ship to anywhere in the world to retain physical copies.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63af3bafea6dbc658ece0e8d/63af3bafea6dbcd6b6ce0ee0_Group%2011.svg)
Cheaper shipping costs: We negotiate discounted rates with carriers and pass on the savings to you.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63af3bafea6dbc658ece0e8d/63af3bafea6dbcd6b6ce0ee0_Group%2011.svg)
Bulk forwarding: Combine mail and packages going to the same address to reduce shipping costs.
[Learn more![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63af3bafea6dbc658ece0e8d/63af3bafea6dbca90ace0ed6_Group%2023.svg)](https://useStable.com/</products/virtual-mailbox>)
![a dashboard showing how packages and mail items can be forwarded through stable](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63af3bafea6dbc658ece0e8d/63e41373e0828d7b9b461f63_Forward.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63af3bafea6dbc658ece0e8d/643730b043c94b5e58a090d0_forward.png)
###### features 3
## Store & Shred
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63af3bafea6dbc658ece0e8d/63af3bafea6dbcd6b6ce0ee0_Group%2011.svg)
Physical storage: We physically store mail for 30 days.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63af3bafea6dbc658ece0e8d/63af3bafea6dbcd6b6ce0ee0_Group%2011.svg)
Shred: Mail is securely shredded after its physical storage period.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63af3bafea6dbc658ece0e8d/63af3bafea6dbcd6b6ce0ee0_Group%2011.svg)
Unlimited digital storage: Digitized documents are always viewable from the Stable dashboard.
[Learn more![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63af3bafea6dbc658ece0e8d/63af3bafea6dbca90ace0ed6_Group%2023.svg)](https://useStable.com/</products/virtual-mailbox>)
![a dashboard showing how documents can be shredded through a stable address](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63af3bafea6dbc658ece0e8d/63e4137370541ebfc637648d_Shred.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63af3bafea6dbc658ece0e8d/643731dea10b40b4a0e33e58_store.png)
###### feature 4
## Deposit Checks
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63af3bafea6dbc658ece0e8d/63af3bafea6dbcd6b6ce0ee0_Group%2011.svg)
**1-click check deposits:** Skip trips to the bank by depositing checks with one click.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63af3bafea6dbc658ece0e8d/63af3bafea6dbcd6b6ce0ee0_Group%2011.svg)
**Easy reconciliation:** We extract information like payer, payee, and amount to close accounting books faster.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63af3bafea6dbc658ece0e8d/63af3bafea6dbcd6b6ce0ee0_Group%2011.svg)
**Deposit automations:** Automatically deposit all received checks to your bank account.
[Learn more![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63af3bafea6dbc658ece0e8d/63af3bafea6dbca90ace0ed6_Group%2023.svg)](https://useStable.com/</products/virtual-mailbox>)
![a dashboard showing how checks can be deposited through a stable address](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63af3bafea6dbc658ece0e8d/63e41373081ee1e9e1185482_Deposit.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63af3bafea6dbc658ece0e8d/6437315b6e9b59a31e207c13_deposit.png)
